properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 11:51AM EST until February 6 at 11:33PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg SC
has issued a Flood Advisory for the Broad River In Sc...Broad River
In Nc...


Broad River In Sc Near Blacksburg affecting Cherokee and York
Counties.
Broad River In Nc At Boiling Springs affecting Cleveland County.

Heavy rain moving across the area has saturated the ground and caused
river levels to rise. Additional rainfall will likely cause the river
to crest just below flood stage.

The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Broad River In Sc Near Blacksburg.
* until Friday night.
* At 11 AM Thursday the stage was 6.2 feet.
* Action Stage is 13.0 feet.
* Minor Flood Stage is 16.0 feet.
* FORECAST: The river will rise to near 15.1 feet by early Friday
afternoon. The river will fall below action stage late Friday night.
* IMPACTS: At 16.0 feet: Minor Flood Stage.  The Broad River may be
flooding River Rd. and Little Hope Rd. near US 29.  Farmland
flooding is continuing adjacent to the river.  Floodwaters at this
level will be similar to levels that occurred on July 8th, 2005..
* IMPACTS: At 15.0 feet: Action Stage Flooding continues.  The Broad
River may be approaching River Rd. and Little Hope Rd. near US 29.
Adjacent farmland and low-lying area flooding is continuing..
* IMPACTS: At 13.0 feet: Action Stage.  The Broad River may be
overflowing its banks and flooding adjacent low-lying areas..
properties.instruction:
A Flood Advisory for a river forecast point means that nuisance
flooding is expected to occur along the river when the river level is
forecast to be just below or at the official  flood stage.

Caution is urged when walking near river banks...keep children away
from drainage areas and culverts.
